full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YI DAM CHOS SRUNGS RNAMS LA BRTEN PA'I BKA' BSGO BYED TSUL DANG LHA SRIN SDE BRGYAD KLU SOGS LA CHAB SHOG BKA' SGO'I RIM PA PHYOGS GCIG TU BSDEBS PA BZHUGS, ,
